articles.title: This “mushroom” is not a fungus, it’s a bizarre plant that breaks all the rules
articles.description: Balanophora is a plant that abandoned photosynthesis long ago and now lives entirely as a parasite on tree roots, hidden in dark forest undergrowth. articles.title: NASA just caught a rare glimpse of an interstellar comet
articles.description: An instrument aboard NASA’s Europa Clipper spacecraft captured rare ultraviolet observations of an interstellar comet while Earth-based telescopes were blinded by the Sun. articles.title: What scientists found inside Titan was not what anyone expected
articles.description: For years, scientists thought Saturn’s moon Titan hid a global ocean beneath its frozen surface. A new look at Cassini data now suggests something very different: a thick, slushy interior with pockets of liquid water rather than an open sea.
